projects.description: A small app that utilizies arrays, objects, and functions. The random quote generator cycles through an array of obejcts to display random quotes to the DOM every six seconds or with the press of a button.

A pagination app that dyanmically creates pagination links based on the number of students in a list. It displays information about 10 students per page and allows the user to filter the list via a search bar.
An engaging, interactive, and easy to use form with custom validation checks and error messages.

A browser-based, phrase guessing game which utilizes JavaScript and Object Oriented Programing. The user can either click on an on-screen keyboard or type letters on their own keyboard to guess letters in the given phrase.
A client side app that uses JavaScript and AJAX to make an employee directory by making a request from a public API.
